name: Hydro Flask Day Escape Soft Cooler Backpack 20L - Unisex
description: For summer picnics or weekend getaways, this fully insulated backpack keeps perishables fresh and beverages chilly. The lined interior wipes down in case of leaks.Burly 600-denier polyester shell with welded seams.Lightweight insulation keeps food cold for up to 36 hours.Watertight zipper for leak-proof transport.2 padded shoulder straps and 2 soft handles provide carry options.Multiple gear loops for attaching accessories.
